data.name: Painkiller Hell & Damnation Digital Extras
data.detailed_description:
Includes:
  • Soundtrack
  • Making Of Video
  • Poster (printable)
  • Sticker templates (printable)
  • Postcards from Hell (printable)
  • Artbook
Note: Digital Extras will be located at Program files -> Steam -> Steamapps -> Common -> Painkiller Hell & Damnation -> Digital extras

data.short_description: Includes:Soundtrack Making Of Video Poster (printable) Sticker templates (printable) Postcards from Hell (printable)Artbook Note: Digital Extras will be located at Program files -> Steam -> Steamapps -> Common -> Painkiller Hell & Damnation -> Digital extras
data.supported_languages:
English*, German*, French*, Italian*, Spanish - Spain*, Czech, Hungarian, Japanese*, Polish*, Russian*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Windows XP SP3, Windows Vista/7
  • Processor:Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 equivalent
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS:Windows Vista/7
  • Processor:2.4 GHz Quad Core processor
  • Memory:3 GB RAM
  • Graphics:NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GTX/ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512+ MB)
  • DirectX®:9.0c
  • Hard Drive:5 GB HD space
  • Sound:DirectX Compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X version 10.6.3 or later
  • Processor: 2 GHz Dual Core Intel CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce GT 9600M/320M, or ATI (AMD) Radeon HD 4670 with 256 MB VRAM. Intel integrated GPUs are not supported
  • Hard Drive: 5 GB HD space
  • Network: Internet (TCP/IP) connection
  • Additional: These specs are still being determined.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS X version 10.7 or later
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz QuadCore Intel CPU
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia 9800/260, or ATI (AMD) Radeon HD 4870 with 512 MB VRAM. Intel integrated GPUs are not supported
  • Hard Drive: 5 GB HD space
  • Network: Internet (TCP/IP) connection
  • Additional: These specs are still being determined.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo @ 2Ghz / AMD Athlon 64 X2 equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 8600 / ATI Radeon HD 2600XT (256 MB)
  • Hard Drive: 5 GB HD space
  • Additional: These specs are still being determined.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04/13.04, Linux Mint 14 & 15 (64-bit)
  • Processor: 2.4 GHz Quad Core processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce 9800 GTX/ATI Radeon HD 4850 (512+ MB)
  • Hard Drive: 5 GB HD space
  • Additional: These specs are still being determined.
